main event: A multiple sighting of a star-shaped object changing colors over Taboga Island and Fort Clayton on August 14, 1960.
interesting points: The object was the size of a nickel and changed colors from red to white to green., The object appeared to be rotating or oscillating in a northwesterly direction., There was no reported beginning or end to the sighting to determine speed, course, or altitude., Ground visual search was conducted with negative radar results., The sighting was reported by very reliable personnel, with notable details about the object's altitude and movements.
location: Taboga Island & Fort Clayton, Canal Zone
